title: [Large-Scale] Elementary Science Teacher Professional Development Program Using Online Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science curriculum content knowledge and lesson design experience
context.additional_context: Real-time collaboration with experts and peer teachers across regional boundaries, enabling flexible mobile-based microlearning

learning_goals: Participants perform peer feedback on science lesson designs with fellow teachers and experts using online collaboration tools at least three times.
Participants can apply three or more instructional strategies (e.g., inquiry-based learning, cooperative learning) required for student-centered science lesson design.
Participants submit one or more science lesson design projects developed in a mobile microlearning environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
